name: Silent Streets of Toxic Meats
description:
The people are going to have radiated foods. You fight using the power of music, to win earn the love of 55 (FIFTY FIVE) people. This game is inspired by the magnificent man here: https://soundcloud.com/brett-alan-music/a-gross-gr...

HOW TO PLAY

  • Play music using space bar, to win the friendship of people! Hearts mean they're permanently yours. They'll tip you money!
  • Music is illegal, cops are magenta if they catch you playing music they'll throw you in jail, and you have to make bail ($100) or you're in prison forever.
  • Red people are just harder to win to your cause. Throw away pamphlets by dragging them into trashcans (stationary square gray things!)

CONTROLS

  • Space to play music.
  • WASD to move.
  • Mouse drag to mouse propaganda pamphlets (throw them away!)
